docs.snippet: Hotel chains are joining a trend started by boutiques in stocking books and newspapers in library-style locations for their guests....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hotel chains are joining a trend started by boutiques in stocking books and newspapers in library-style locations for their guests.
docs.abstract: Hotel chains are joining trend started by boutiques, stocking books and newspapers in library-style locations for their guests; challenge is persuading guests to spend more time, and money, in on-site restaurants and bars, rather than venturing outside.

headline.main: Hotels Add Libraries as Amenity to Keep Guests Inside
